text: I too should have mine together today, probably by the end of business. Still feeling out WordPress
Article is done... formatted and Pending Review :slightly_smiling_face:
super excited
I finished mine, but did I accidently publish it straight onto the website?
I think so
The Inquiry Cycle
<@U3NM43H5M>: I unpublished it, should be fine now
You guys shouldn't even be able to do that. I better fix your privileges
Good, thank you. So obviously I shouldn't have pressed the "Publish" button when I finished. Must have wanted "Save Draft" correct?
1900 words is fine, also
You want to change status from "Draft" to "Pending Review" then hit SAVE... yup, definitely don't hit Publish. :slightly_smiling_face:
I will remove your ability to hit publish at all right now
Hehe, that sounds reasonable
Can someone go in to a draft they haven't published and tell me what the options are, now? Not Henry or an admin, obvs
Think you have it now Jason... two images incoming. First is a NEW post in draft form...
That's what I want
Good, I did at thing and it woiked
This one is the article I submitted for review... Noticing it is no longer available for the author to edit after submitted for a review. Good to go!
ah, I see. Yeah the "Submit for Review" wasn't originally on my side, instead just the "Publish" button.
Hmm, I don't like that. Let me see if I can add the capability to edit submitted pieces
You should be able to try editing a submitted post. Can you?
I mean now - I changed something
still looks same on my end.
Oh well, if you want to edit a submitted piece in the future, let us know if it's an issue and we'll figure it out
that works for me... don't submit for review until absolutely sure article is complete. Got it. :slightly_smiling_face:
Curious... Is there going to be an article release schedule or will articles just be published after being reviewed by editor?
Both
I'm not sure what you're asking
I'm curious what your plan is for moving "submitted" articles to "published" because just looking at the articles now I saw some problems with missing / double-# hashtags and featured images

The editor still has to make a pass through. The editor can probably unlock the article but in general, make sure your article is actually done before you submit it or it's a pain in our ass and we'll probably eventually yell at you
We'll create a checklist of stuff for authors to make sure they do before submitting for review and the editor is the final step in the process before publication
any idea when the next article's gonna be released?
We should come up with a process for posting to twitter and fb

Do you have any input? We should have some ready to go. I was working on a schedule now that we added a second wave of writers. I wanted to publish new writers' first pieces before we published anyone's second piece if we can avoid it. If we have to hold off an release 2 or 3 on Monday then start scheduling them to come out two or three times a week, we can do that
There is a plugin that automatically tweets a link
I'm just kinda concerned that it's been 2 weeks since we released our last article
granted it's been the holidays so I don't think that many people have noticed
It takes time to get people acclimated in the beginning. It will be easier in the future to add the off author here and there when we have 10 or 12 people on a schedule.
I think we should do a batch Monday and then start releasing them at intervals
Once people start seeing reddit posts for the articles they will know the check the site regularly, or they'll just click the link when they see it on reddit
Does a batch make sense? Perhaps do one a day? I noticed that articles near the top of the page did better
Might give us better stats idk
We don't have to do a batch. We can release one right damn now if there is one we think is ready and we can tweet and reddit post about it. Is there an EDHREC Facebook page?
Yeah
We have a fb page. We get decent engagement
I gave mine to henry yesterday
It would be cool if someone posted a link to that whenever we publish an article
Yeah
It can be manual for now. Ill donit
Do it
This was before jason fixed the permissions, so it's currently private and set for a year from now (to avoid early publish)
Feel fairly confident in mine... shouldn't (hopefully) take too much editing
I don't know if henry looked at it yet
Also.... a suggestion, If I may. An RSS feed will also help. Unless I missed it, I don't see a link to one yet on EDHREC
By the way Nate... love your podcast. Well done sir. :slightly_smiling_face:
Thank you
question for writers: are you all getting this deck format from somewhere?  I'm noticing that most people are only breaking decks into Creatures, Spells, and Lands
How do you want it broken down? We can change the style guide
Gathering Magic breaks it into creatures spells and lands
But I can make the style guide say whatever
I usually write my lists grouped by function.
I listed it by what the style guide said to. I'm open to whatever.
I'd prefer for it to have subtype sections, e.g.:
but if that's too much minutia, I'm certainly open to discussion
I've seen that deck before....
heheh
WRITERS WILL DO WHAT WE TELL THEM TO DO. NO AMOUNT OF MINUTIA IS TOO SMALL
I can let everyone know and we can change the style guide
also a few notes about tags:
the # is automatically applied, so if your tag is `#golgari`, it's going to show up as `##golgari`
and the style I was going for initially was all lowercase, no spaces, generally simple things that we can spam everywhere (e.g. tribe names, color combo names, or things like "combo", "control"
however I'm reconsidering
and it might be a good idea to make an exception for commander names
just to make it easier for readers to see which commander an article is about
It might be easier to train me and Henry on it than to tell a dozen authors
They leave it blank and we add tags before we publish
fair enough
difficult for me to know who's responsible for what :stuck_out_tongue:
anyone feel free to ignore anything that seeems irrelevant to you
I always do
I'll just bug you when an article is published and still has these issues
Plus Henry will bug them, then I'll bug them. It wil be our TPS report
bugs everywhere
a swarm of locusts
So should the authors be tagging their own articles?
No
cats and dogs living together
Leave that to a trained professional
When do they arrive jason?
<http://instantrimshot.com/>
<http://www.hiyoooo.com>

attachments.title: Hiyoooo!
attachments.text: Hiyoooo! Because everyone needs a co-host.

text: jason w/ a writer
so. Jason, if I wanted to write an article to have published next week...the answer would be what if it was on a AER legend vs a C16 partner pair?
I'm getting mixed messages here
I can't tell what you're asking me
(he’s asking the rate of the vig to get an article out faster)
can I have somenting published next week, or is that dependant on what I want to write about?
Yes, no
and if so, what day am I aiming for publication
ok
I have a feeling I'm just going to make a schedule and it's going to be very arbitrary
meh
so just tell me a day then :smile:
If there is a day you prefer, tell me now before I make the schedule
Thursday
I would prefer to publish on Thursday
My article is basically done. I need to look over it a few more times, but then it'll be submitted
OK, then your article is due on Tuesday for Thursday publication
fantastic
that's going to give me a seizure
minimize it
It's really hard to minimize the impact of a serious medical issue, man
oh, you mean the pic
Hehe
If you want, I can just say "I'll publish Wednesday and submit Monday!" to make the schedule slightly less arbitrary
OK
Thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
We're all still on 2 a month, so it's every other week for now
I can submit by Wednesday/publish Friday
Can do! In which case, my first Low Market article can certainly be ready by this Monday for Wednesday release
OK, Dom
Also, if someone has a catchier name than "Low Market" for a budget Commander series, I'm all ears
I actually kind of like Low Market
Oh, cool
I'm gonna start recording known bugs in a google doc so that when I get a chunk of free time I'll actually remember what needs fixing

this is what I've got so far, anyone have anything else to add to the list?
```
Can’t center multiple images
Deck titles become garbage when using special chars
```
It's fairly minor, but I noticed last night that for some reason I can't link to the card Garruk's Packleader unless I remove the apostrophe, might just be an error in the URL
I like "Low Market" assuming it's a reference to the card High Market.
shadowsauce: yup! That's the idea
<@U3M60281W> you can use @ to call out ppl fyi
How about Limited Resources? It’s kinda catchy...
Yup, just didn't feel the need to ping them, nothing urgent :slightly_smiling_face:
also allows for tab completion
Oh man, if only
:smiling_imp:
I wish
youre kidding righ <@U3L7A68JC>
I can only assume so
s/assume/hope
Dsaccento, i had apostrophe trouble too w mind's dilation. Replaced ' with %27 then the card image worked but the name showed %27
Changed back to ' then image worked
interesting
apostrophes are also problematic for decklist titles
I'll add it to the list
<@U3MTAQBE1> thanks I'll give that a try
"Apostrophes Are Problematic" is my David Keatts cover band
I suspect wordpress caches the card tag image urls somewhere and the %27 maybe works and stays cached. That's my programmer hunch
Either that or the act of changing it clears some odd hidden characters - similar thing happened with the Reliquary Tower problem.
If I copied that line and moved it about the problem followed, when I deleted it and retyped, it worked.
Whoooooa
So you guys quit trying to type in Esperanto or whatever...
:wink:

I think our current policy is that someone from EDHREC will handle posting the new articles to twitter and Facebook, etc. Authors are encouraged to post to reddit if they want to and obviously everyone is encouraged to tweet and retweet the new articles and even share them on your personal FB if you want. We want as much exposure as possible, but EDHREC's account won't be posting them on reddit specifically, so if you want your piece on there, it's up to you
Seems like a good plan, and that way the authors can more easily respond to comments people leave on Reddit
Sounds reasonable! I'll definitely retweet and such. Can probably also plug the new article section on upcoming Talking Atlas podcast episodes
This is an odd effect...
what? being hit by a car?
name should have been Roadkill, but that's an instant/sorcery
Exiling vs. destroy for one :wink:
Does the card smash it into another dimension?
At 88 miles per hour?
do they use a mile or an hour for that matter?
also the flavor text implies that anything "caught in the brights" acts like a gremlin
Could be a Glockenspiel pre Percocet for all I care...
:smiling_imp:
idk, why can wall of omens wear lightning greaves?
how does suntail hawk carry three SoFaI?
WHY IS THE PIRATE A BAD PILOT?
I need answers to all these things
Hehe
This is why I have to try Flavor Commander!

"Her Suntail Hawk can't carry three swords!"
"You're absolutely right, it drops one of them into the graveyard."
"your firebolt doesn't hurt my fire elemental"
The first sword gives the hawk +2/+2, making it trival to carry the other swords
I tap my homewoard path to return my creature from your path to exile
Aw, that's so heartwarming
It's not a question of where it grips it, it's a question of weight ratios
Jason
it's not a matter of how strongly it grips them

"I cast Swords to Plowshares on his Sword."
"Ok, it becomes a Gruul War Plow."
it's a simple matter of weight ratios
Obviously the Hawk carries one sword in each claw and one in the the beak.
Like in One Piece
ITS NOT A MATTER OF WHERE 'E GRIPS EM
You don’t want to know where it holds the fourth
O__O
Or, perhaps he swallows them and spits them at targets, then scoops them back up at the end of combat.
that gif was terrible

"Brion Stourarm can totally throw the Sword at you."
"Sure, you get a guaranteed combat damage trigger and two damage, but your opponent controls the Sword now."
let's not revisit Kamigawa mechanics
Ninja!
Hehe
Birdjitsu
I don't care how clever you are, you can't impersonate a Pendreill Mist
wtf does he do, interpretive dance?
this game
"They said I could be anything, so I became a Sol Ring."
"They said I could be anything, so–" *SPARK IGNITION*
TOO CLEVER
It’s Ninja Magic, baby…it’s a secret
it's hard not to laugh when Emrakul wears an Armadillo Cloak.
still can't read that word and not hear this in my head
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=110iUX1Ursk>

text: I always like trolling through the spoiler for little EDH tidbits that we get, and I like this card as just a solid all-rounder
I like that a lot
only artifacts, not enchantments?  not sure I'd call that an "all-rounder" lol
Kind of a sidegrade to Unravel the Aether / Deglamer? Interesting
Not liable to play it in Commander, but I'm curious about what Standard impact it might have
Yeah i like it and maybe in a controlly deck, but seems like it would eventually get cut. I like that worst case you nuke someones sol rong
Would be a lot better if it hit enchantments too
I still think I'd always run Unravel the Aether, this doesn't hit Gods
Yeah
Kind of forgot that unravel the aether is a card, its much better
Wtf that seems broken
Meren
Idk I feel like meren already has it pretty easy getting exp counters
Here's a great common.
Even with a planeswalker at 3 loyalty, playing that and then killing it brings it to 12
yeah in my experience meren caps out pretty quickly on exp counters
Oooh another counter.... not double
Sorry i cant read
Not nearly as good
The Maulfist turbo charges Meren
<@U286Q175Y>: it's for each kind of counter, not for each counter
Oh whoops you beat me to it sorry
don is spoiled by doubling season
Yup
The blue pirate uncommon is worded the same way. When I first saw it I thought it could take someone from 5 to 10 poison counters and I was terrified
Yeah
Dont like that enchant land
Why not? Not for Commander but in limited it's never a dead card, fixes mana early, draws a card later, triggers Revolt and feeds Delirium...
For G
triggering revolt could make it pretty deece
Normally these kind of enchantments do just the fixing and sit there.
it makes for an interesting discussion
because it's 1 mana and cycles
but your card is "locked" while you're using it
Locked?
yes
I'm not sure I follow.
I guess i like it more now that i realize you can tap it for mana then sac it
if you still have that on a land, you don't have the extra card
Ok...but hats only because you need it there.
You get to choose.
Its like card advantage on loan
Reminds me to Attune with Aether for limited, fixes for cheap and fuels a limited mechanic
yes what don said
Or card advantage with upside.
several upsides and downsides
Like the same card that just cantrips immediately is substantially better obvioisly
More up than down. I'm not saying it's a first pick - but it's incredible versatile at common.
You can cantrip it immediately if you want.
Good point
It's incredibly flexible for a G
In a Mazerik deck it could be a poor-man's fetch land.
yeah I think it could be pretty good, I'm mostly just trying to comment on how interesting this sort of card can be, not as much on good/bad
like gitaxian probe and street wraith are broken but sometimes you start out with 3 of them in a hand and you can't tell if it's a keep or a mull
makes things interesting
Do i play the enchant land thingy in enchantress? I might try it
What color enchantress? If you're looking for that effect, Utopia Sprawl is another great option
Naya. I play utopia sprawl wild growth and trace of abundance
This is different though because it doesnt ramp.
Probably not? I feel like not. I currently play Abundant Growth in 5C Hondens, but I don't think I would consider it as strongly in thee colors
*three
Oh wow. That puts it into perspective. Abundant growth is effectively strictly better, sans things that take advantage of saccing
Pretty much, yeah
Thats the second time in an hour i judge a card and forgot i was underwhelmed by a predecessor :)
Ill just quit while im ahead
Hehe
I think the value Proposition changes if you decide to incorporate any Revolt cards.
When it comes to Commander, I think I'd sooner load up on fetchland variants
Sure but it also depends on your budget.
I mean even the not-as-good ones: Evolving Wilds, Terramorphic Expanse, the Panoramas, all those guys
What kind of budget Commander author would I be if I didn't keep the budget options in mind :wink:
As always it depends on what your deck is trying to do.
Yeah, Revolt.dec would be a small challenge to put together, you've only got 17 cards and none of them Legendary :disappointed:
Let's be clear - in the annals of MTG it isn't s a great card - it's just a strong common from the current set.
Oh yeah, totally
More than happy to play it in Limited
This is how I feel, but with energy. Atraxa probably does the best impersonation, but I was hoping we'd see a legend that produced and used energy.
Yeah, same here
I ended up stuffing all Kaladeshi goodies (servos, thopters, energy) into a Breya list, but a Commander to directly support the theme would've been awesome
Also, I'm inordinately pleased that they made a straight-up turret card
It's so silly
I really wanna try to make the turret work in draft
I bet you could. It's a Common, force mono-turret? :smile:
If it could hit creatures you'd be in business. As it stands, maybe if you have enough removal / blockers?
The torrent is basically an energy rock.
Ok so above my brain was just inserting enchantment. I don't like the card without that loool
Errr...turret
And here we've totally moved on, just wanted the record straight
I like the common land thingy in Mazirek
I actually like a couple things in this set in mazirek
I was gonna mention that before, lots of these revolt enablers are good in there
Last couple sets have been good to thatcommander
And SBA
Athreos SBA would actually love this card
What colors is your rats deck?
Its not built right now.
Tried a few things
there are a ton of combos
I like green for [[Bloodbond March]]
But that's just me
Also beep boop wake up robot
[[Bloodbond March]]
Bloodbond March - <http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?name=Bloodbond%20March&type=card&.jpg>
Bloodbond March - <http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?name=Bloodbond%20March&type=card&.jpg>
[[Sol Ring]]
Sol Ring - <http://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?name=Sol%20Ring&type=card&.jpg>
alright its back up and i put it in a more reliable place
Lol ty
